Prev: Placa de Santa Maria Up: Gothic Quarter Next: Catalans Illustres

Carrer del Argenteria



The shops along the alleys of the gothic quarter seem to be arranged by streets -- art galleries on one, shoe stores on another, etc. I assume the name means that this is or was a street of silversmiths.
Taken Sunday, September 09, 2001, 02:03:38pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 972kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/80s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 205mm
